title: Page
description: The Page component, containing styles and margins for other components.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Expanded top/bottom margins on the main item

classes.name: styling
classes.description: Whether or not to apply global styling. Preferred option is to not use styling, followed by ilw-font, followed by ilw-format

classes.name: margins
classes.description: Whether or not to use the default margins. Preferred option is to not use margins, followed by ilw-margin.

css-variables.name: --ilw-page--main-margin-top
css-variables.description: If expanded attribute is used, the top margin of the main element will be this size

css-variables.name: --ilw-page--main-margin-bottom
css-variables.description: If expanded attribute is used, the bottom margin of the main element will be this size

css-variables.name: --ilw-page--margin
css-variables.description: Left/right margin of the main element. The ilw-margin class needs to be set if you are using this.
